title: QUICKFIRE Academy LF Player
body:
Hello,

For those who want a Team Environment, QUICKFIRE Academy is looking for someone that can play Mid/Jungle.

Our team is Currently Bronze 1, We are rapidly ascending in the Ranks.

The Requirements for Joining are:

Teamspeak (Absolute Must. If you are shy it's ok we're extremely laidback)
Gold - Silver
Must be able to play from 7pm - 11pm

Note:  (Not every night everyone will be online, so don't stress if you can't come online. Just leave a message in the group chat ahead of times)

Add Me on the Client if you are keen to join QUICKFIRE Academy. {{champion:429}}

replies.body: hey im plat 5 just looking for a team i added you 5cg biggles i can play in any role
silver 2 adc main. would love to play in your team.
not gold/silver anymore. i was silver but dropped down. been climbing back up steadily. added you in client any time is fine for me

I sent you a request, im not gold/silver, but im rapidly climbing though bronze and wish to gain more experience to climb even higher. Im a jungle main with and off role of mid. Im 25 years old and have a no troll laid back attitude. Hope to hear from you soon :)

Syn
